options.content:
If you select a specific user above.
Please click the reload button next to time filter

targets.query: SHOW MEASUREMENTS

panels.title: "SHOW MEASUREMENTS" that are available to use

targets.query: show field keys from "cpanel_quota_percent"
show tag keys from "cpanel_quota_percent"
show field keys from "cpanel_bandwidth"
show tag keys from "cpanel_bandwidth"
SELECT DISTINCT("url") as "Metric URL" FROM (SELECT * FROM "cpanel_meta" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) GROUP BY "url")

options.content: General Counters and Counters over Time

targets.query: SELECT SUM(last_counter) FROM (SELECT last(gauge) AS "last_counter"  FROM "cpanel_users_active" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY url)
SELECT gauge FROM "cpanel_users_active" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "url"

panels.title: cPanel Server Active Accounts Total Over Time

targets.query: SELECT last("gauge") * 1000 FROM "process_start_time_seconds" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("gauge") * 1000 FROM "process_start_time_seconds" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.description: Show as table, incase multiple cPanel servers are listed to be viewed

targets.query: SELECT (last(gauge) * 1000) as "Start Time" FROM "cpanel_start_time_unix_timestamp" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY url

panels.title: cPanel Server Started Date List

targets.query: SELECT SUM(last_counter) FROM (SELECT last(gauge) AS "last_counter"  FROM "cpanel_users_suspended" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY url)
SELECT version FROM (SELECT counter::field,"release"::tag,"version"::tag FROM "cpanel_meta" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) ORDER BY time DESC

panels.description: Show as table, incase multiple cPanel servers are listed to be viewed

targets.query: SELECT last(counter::field),"version"::tag FROM "cpanel_meta" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY url

panels.title: cPanel Server Version List

targets.query: SELECT gauge FROM "cpanel_users_suspended" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "url"

panels.title: cPanel Suspended Accounts Total Over Time

targets.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH key = plan WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/)
SELECT SUM(last_counter) AS "FTP Accounts" FROM (SELECT last(gauge) AS "last_counter"  FROM "cpanel_ftp_accounts" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY url)
SELECT gauge FROM "cpanel_ftp_accounts" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "url"

panels.title: cPanel Server Total FTP Accounts Over Time

targets.query:
SELECT
    SUM(last) AS "utilization"
FROM (
    SELECT
        LAST("gauge")
    FROM "cpanel_bandwidth"
    WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/)
        AND $timeFilter
       AND "user" =~ /$cpanel_user/
    GROUP BY "user","url"
)

panels.title: cPanel Total User Bandwidth Used Within Billing Period (cpanel bandwidth.cache - Includes users without a bandwidth quota)

targets.query:
SELECT
    SUM(last) AS "utilization"
FROM (
    SELECT
        LAST("gauge")
    FROM "cpanel_bandwidth_user_used"
    WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/)
        AND $timeFilter
        AND "user" =~ /$cpanel_user/
    GROUP BY "user","url"
)

panels.title: cPanel Total User Bandwidth Used Within Billing Period (cpanel uapi - Users with a bandwidth quota)

targets.query: SELECT SUM(last_counter) FROM (SELECT last(gauge) AS "last_counter"  FROM "cpanel_domains_configured" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY url)
SELECT gauge FROM "cpanel_domains_configured" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "url"

panels.title: cPanel Server Total Domains Configured Over TIme

targets.query: SELECT last(gauge) FROM "cpanel_bandwidth" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND "user" =~ /$cpanel_user/ AND $timeFilter group by "user","url"
SELECT SUM(last_counter) FROM (SELECT last(gauge) AS "last_counter"  FROM "cpanel_mailboxes_configured" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY url)
SELECT sum(last) FROM (SELECT last(gauge::field),"user"::tag FROM "cpanel_quota_used" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter AND "user" =~ /$cpanel_user/ GROUP BY "user"::tag,"url")
SELECT gauge FROM "cpanel_mailboxes_configured" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "url"

panels.title: cPanel Server Total Mailboxes Configured Over TIme

targets.query: SELECT last(gauge) FROM "cpanel_quota_used" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter AND "user" =~ /$cpanel_user/ group by "user","url"
SELECT gauge, "user"::tag FROM "cpanel_quota_percent" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter AND "user" =~ /$cpanel_user/ GROUP BY "user"::tag

panels.title: cPanel Disk Quota Usage By User

targets.query: SELECT max("gauge"), "url" FROM "cpanel_quota_percent" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter AND "user" =~ /$cpanel_user/ GROUP BY "user"::tag

panels.title: cPanel Highest Disk Quota Percentage Usage

targets.query: SELECT gauge::field FROM "cpanel_bandwidth" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter AND "user" =~ /$cpanel_user/ GROUP BY "user"::tag

panels.title: cPanel Bandwidth Usage Over Time Within Billing Period

panels.description: This is their maximum bandwidth utilization from their plan. It's show as a percentage of bandwidth used of out of their maximum allowed.

targets.query: SELECT gauge::field FROM "cpanel_bandwidth_user_used_percent" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter AND "user" =~ /$cpanel_user/ GROUP BY "user"::tag

panels.title: cPanel Bandwidth Usage Percent of User Over Time Within Billing Period

targets.query: SELECT SUM(last_counter) FROM (SELECT last(gauge) AS "last_counter"  FROM "cpanel_sessions_email" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY url)

panels.title: cPanel Server Total Active Email Sessions

targets.query: SELECT SUM(last_counter) FROM (SELECT last(gauge) AS "last_counter"  FROM "cpanel_sessions_web" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY url)

panels.title: cPanel Server Total Active Web Sessions (WHM & cPanel)

targets.query: SELECT "gauge" FROM "cpanel_sessions_email" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "url"

panels.title: cPanel Server Total Active Email Sessions Over TIme

targets.query: SELECT "gauge" FROM "cpanel_sessions_web" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "url"

panels.title: cPanel Server Total Active Web Sessions (WHM & cPanel) Over TIme

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT("url") FROM (SELECT * FROM "cpanel_meta" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "url")
list.label: cPanel
list.name: instance
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT("url") FROM (SELECT * FROM "cpanel_meta" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "url")

list.definition: SELECT "user" FROM (SELECT MAX(gauge),"url" FROM "cpanel_bandwidth" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP by "user")
list.label: cPanel User
list.name: cpanel_user
list.query: SELECT "user" FROM (SELECT MAX(gauge),"url" FROM "cpanel_bandwidth" WHERE ("url" =~ /^$instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP by "user")
